forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
